txt.en: You have received a letter from King Thorin Stonehelm, asking you to return to him in Erebor and assist him with another matter.
Received a letter from King Thorin Stonehelm
DNT complete the erebor quest chain
Accept a letter from King Thorin Stonehelm
Peace has come to the kingdom under the mountain, but now, as the dust settles, all is not quiet or peaceful in King Thorin Stonehelm's court.
